entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
